title: Site-19 Security Data 19.2022.10.31
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:halloween]]
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[HTML]]
<iframe src="https://itch.io/embed-upload/6688745?color=000000" allowfullscreen  style="width: 100%; aspect-ratio: 16/15;"></iframe>

[[/HTML]]

I might've gone a little bit overboard on my contest entry but i do that with literally every single thing I have ever done so that's okay. It's ART. I went with the second prompt! I got as many people who asked for their characters to be here as I could as well as some extra kids because... it's a party for children. It should work on both mobile and desktop but might look a bit wonky on mobile. If it doesn't work for you(either mobile or desktop) try viewing it on the itch.io page. There are links to each of the characters' sources in the interactable itself.

[[collapsible show="Okay here's my giant crediting portion below." hide="I'm sorry licensing team."]]

Well, Hope y'all like it! If there are any bugs or you want me to change gross mischaracterization of your characters just let me know. I'll fix em up.(but not the gross-mischaracterization of your characters tho. That's staying. Sorry.) 

[https://github.com/IronShears/Halloween Github Link of source code for Translators. Godot required. Many tutorials are available online but free to contact me for assistance.]

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/kuobachs-eyes ALSO READ MY COMIC]
